title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.12 - Protection of cargo
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2.12 - Protection of cargo

State Regulations

Every pier superintendent having overall charge or
supervision of the operations of the pier or other waterfront terminal who is
employed by a carrier of freight by water having the responsibility of
safeguarding waterborne freight shall cause all cargo on the pier or terminal
to be so protected from theft or pilferage as may be reasonably necessary and
appropriate for the particular cargo. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 21

2.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
